channel.title: upcycled on Morja
channel.description: Recent content in upcycled on Morja

item.title: CVETKA
item.description: Cvetka represents a person who accepts the state of being unwanted, the stage of not belonging somewhere or to someone and still seeing through all of it, becoming something more.

item.title: ROZALIJA
item.description: Rozalija, inspired by colorful Salvation Mountain by Leonard Knight in California Desert Area, USA and clothing details and sillhuetes of the 50s, was designed as my 3rd yearsâ€™ final collection as a student of Textile and fashion design at the Faculty of Natural Science and Engineering under the mentorship of prof.
